Articles.Content: I have noticed (or I was blind) that banner is now bigger than before and it looks rather low quality at that resolution

The larger image that was used previously was causing some issues for mobile users so it has been replaced with a smaller version. I'm guessing that the lower res image is being stretched more than before.
